column4: Microsoft  Banco Votorantim partner on Brazil fintech investments
column5: SAO PAULO Microsoft Corp  and Brazilian lender Banco Votorantim are investing together in financial technology startups  executives said in a Monday interview  as the U.S. tech company adds a new specialty to its venture capital portfolio in Brazil.

column4: Microsoft  Banco Votorantim partner on Brazil fintech investments
column5: SAO PAULO  Oct 10 Microsoft Corp and Brazilian lender Banco Votorantim are investing together in financial technology startups  executives said in a Monday interview  as the U.S. tech company adds a new specialty to its venture capital portfolio in Brazil.

column4: BRIEF-Innofactor buys Lumagate to expand in Nordic countries
column5: * Has reached agreement on acquiring Lumagate group  Nordic IT service providers focused on cloud-based solutions in Microsoft ecosystem
